name: s3://eodata/CLMS/bio-geophysical/net-gross_primary_production/gpp_global_300m_10daily_v2
browserSearchPath: CLMS Bio-geophysical Parameters, Vegetation, Net/Gross Primary Production
collectionDescription: Provides information about the total amount of carbon compounds produced by photosynthesis of plants in an ecosystem in a given period of time, expressed in gC/m²/day. Every 10-days, estimates are available at global scale, at a spatial resolution of ~ 300 m, from January 2014 to the present. More information here.

layers.longDescription: GPP is defined as the total amount of carbon compounds produced by photosynthesis of plants in an ecosystem in a given period of time, expressed in gC/m²/day.
